channel.title: DxRxWebClient Looking For Staff~ Thing's In DxRx-2006" Please RE-POST Help The S
channel.description:
"Thing's In DxRx-2006" Please RE-POST Help The Server Grow! [img]http://oi48.tinypic.com/5boa3d.jpg[/img] [size=18pt]DXXR.TK <<<[/size]
This is a 474 server- Online 24/7! Fourms-*** Customs including-Death Cape,colored whips,demonic kite, ect with golden wings included! BENEFITS: 459 Look 459 Characters 459 Animations & NPC's PVP Item Loot System Unique Kill Streak Point Shops An amazing dxrx shop!(gain points from slayer/pvp.) Brilliant Combat System Perfect Item Switching Old style hitmarks Fully Working Ancient Curses New Bank & Shop Interfaces Fast Loading Client With Low Memory Usage Dueling,Staking. - Dice - pvp,pvm - gwd Pest Control 30+ customs! ____________________ Become a part of the friendly community! Drop partys every few weeks,This is a stable eco. Limes, Lava, Custom Whips *** is a 2006 base server with customs,which we have several diffrent ones to choose from! -- we also have a nice community with respectful staff!once you join you will have helped the community grow while having fun on the server that is best, just see for you're self. (: This is a Rsc server that allowes you to play 24\\7/skilling/pvp/pvm and also dicing.Also great active community. However this is a new server so please join and you will await other new players in the process! This will be a great server once you join the comunity.Anyone can play and anyone who :: donate will recieve a reward depending on the payment amount. Youtube video Click to View Content This is a legit 2006 based server! Join today and you will become in love .We are looking for staff
Dxxr.TK
